dialogue.speaker: Charlie
dialogue.message: I suggest we focus on identifying any unusual behavior or inconsistencies among us to increase the chances of discovering the assassin. We should communicate openly and honestly to build trust and work together as a team.

dialogue.message: Based on my investigation, I firmly believe Alice is the assassin. It's important for us to keep a close eye on her actions while maintaining open communication to build trust and increase our chances of identifying the assassin together.
